game.name: Treasure hunt for the city of Bar, Montenegro
game.desc: Some of the best places to visit in the city of Bar, both cultural and entertaining.

clue.riddle: King Nicola s Palace, on the sea-shore, emerged in green with beautiful park on its back.
Popular workout zone, called "Å umice" near the sea.
Temple of a saint Jovan Vladimir, still in construction but still beautiful!
Caffe zone in the city center, take a break before going on the next clue, that is a little bit farther.
Old city of Bar, fortress and museum. Hopefully, you will get free entrance if you show them that you are on a Geostep Quest.
